bibl.title: Stesichorus' Geryoneis, SLG 15 i-ii. Avec résumé en grec.
bibl.note: The fragments of P. Oxy. XXXIII, 2617 pose numerous problems, out of which those arising from Suppl. Lyr. Gr. 15 i-ii have been singled out for examination.
bibl.seg: TSITSIBAKOU-VASALOS Evanthia, Stesichorus' Geryoneis, SLG 15 i-ii. Avec résumé en grec.
The fragments of P. Oxy. XXXIII, 2617 pose numerous problems, out of which those arising from Suppl. Lyr. Gr. 15 i-ii have been singled out for examination.
